title: Dance Divas: Two to Tango
description: In book two of the new Dance Divas series, Miss Toni decides to shake things up for an upcoming round of dance competitions. She wants to see Liberty and Rochelle perform duets--with the same boy! The girls--who aren't the best of friends to say the least--must dance with Hayden, one of the cutest twelve-year-old boys in town. But things take a dramatic leap when both of them develop their first crushes. Now they aren't just dancing for first place . . . but to win Hayden's heart.
author: Sheryl Berk
